    Transform DEM to 3D pointcloud of raster corners.

    dem_to_points.Rd

    Transform DEM to 3D pointcloud of raster corners.

    dem_to_points(dem, bh = NULL, parallel = F)

    Arguments

    dem

    Digital elevation model of class RasterLayer.

    bh

    Border height from lowest point.

    parallel

    Logical. Use parallel computation?

    Value

    A 3D point cloud for raster cell corners.

    Examples

    dem <- sim_terrain(20, 0.5)
raster::plot(dem)

pts <- dem_to_points(dem)
#> Error in dem_to_points(dem): could not find function "dem_to_points"
rgl::plot3d(pts)
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'pts' not found
